Entry.Translation: Shorter than int(MIN_TREATY_TURNS) Turns since last link(DIPLOMACY_WAR)
Мастер разведки~Мастера разведки~Мастеру разведки~Мастера разведки~Мастером разведки~Мастере разведки
Осадное орудие~Осадные орудия~Осадных орудий~Осадным орудиям~Осадные орудия~Осадными орудиями~Осадных орудиях
Existing nations don't start with any extra territory
Existing nations start with an average of two cities
Existing nations start with an average of three cities
Existing nations start with an average of four cities
Existing nations start with an average of five cities
Human players follow the same rules as the AI.
Characters and Families are removed from the game.
Map starts fully revealed and stays visible.
Players cannot move their Teammates' Units.
The save file is checked against a hash to prevent modification using an outside editor.
Player is not allowed to undo a move after it has been made.
Cannot change gameplay player options after the game has started
Randomize starting Leader of each Nation.
Randomize the class of each Family (Sage, Artisan, Champion, etc).
No popup help when making narrative choices for events
AI nations will try to keep each other (including you) from winning
Players are not allowed to control more than one city.
Allow players to join a multiplayer game even if a slot has already been claimed.
Players can join the game as observers
Characters do not frequently die young
For Leaders and Governors, Wisdom increases {YIELD_SCIENCE}. For Generals, Wisdom increases the Unit's Critical Hit Chance.
For Leaders and Governors, Charisma increases {YIELD_CIVICS}. For Generals, Charisma increases the Unit's Defense Strength.
For Leaders and Governors, Courage increases {YIELD_TRAINING}. For Generals, Courage increases the Unit's Strength.
For Leaders and Governors, Discipline increases {YIELD_MONEY}. For Generals, Discipline increases the Unit's XP each Year.
Multiple players can claim each nation
Each available nation can be claimed by one player
Each nation can be claimed by one player per team
Each player follows a random, potentially different, succession order
Rise of Carthage - Game Four - NOT PLAYABLE
